tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have visited doctor Karan sir for femur implant removal. 
I was very much worried about the surgery and about the difficulty post surgery, but Karan sir explained and made me understand so well about the surgery and recovery time in the very first appointment itself.He did the Surgery and it was successful . Had few dressings after surgery, for almost all visits, he was there and each time, he checked if any issue was there and has advised accordingly. He is very friendly. He pays attention and answers all questions with patience. Very much impressed and happy with the treatment given by doctor Karan  sir, Thank you Sirüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a bike accident 4 months ago and suffered fractures in hand and leg. Dr. Karan Kukreja performed the surgeries, placing plates in both areas. I had to visit several times after surgeries for checkups and dressings. I had an excellent experience with him. He took the time to explain all my questions, the necessary care, and how the healing was progressing. He is very polite and straightforward. Thanks to his exceptional care and expertise, I am now able to walk again and am doing well. I highly recommend Dr. Karan Kukreja for his outstanding medical skill and dedication to his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr. Karan for my 62-year-old mother when she experienced severe knee pain (both knees) in February 2024. Standing for longer than 20 minutes and activities like climbing stairs and squatting were extremely painful. After conducting a thorough examination he diagnosed her with early-stage knee osteoarthritis and recommended three weeks of physiotherapy along with muscle strengthening exercises, which significantly alleviated her pain. We liked that Dr. Karan closely monitored her progress periodically and provided constant motivation to adhere to the exercise regimen. He emphasizes the importance of exercise and a healthy lifestyle for long-term benefits instead of just prescibing medicines. His proficiency in local languages (Kannada)  did help in making the patient comfortable and no matter how many questions we really appreciate his patience and care. We  would highly recommend  him for any ortho related ailments or surgeries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was a first time visit. Doctor came after almost 1.5 hours waiting and then another 1 hour went as he was checking other patients. When my turn came he again went and we kept on waiting. After complaining to the hospital, they said they arrange for another doctor but that didn‚Äôt happen at all. ******* ******** ****** ****** *** ***** ***** ***** **** ***** ******* **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Met Dr. Karan through a reference for my brother‚Äôs Ortho surgery after fractures through road accident. We are very happy with Dr. Karan‚Äôs humane approach towards patients and attending families. 
Not only,  professionally very skilled doctor but very kind human being as well.  He listens carefully and explains well. 
Very happy to have found him at the right time. 
*** ** *** **** ***** ******* ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had near fatal accident 5 years ago,had brain haemorrhage,rib fractures n left hand fracture. All healed except my hand fracture. After 4 unsuccessful surgeries,I came to Dr.Karan Kukreja after an Orthopedist recommended him. He went thru my medical history and the complications of my previous surgeries. He was determined to fix my bone n make me surgery-free.  He did a detailed analysis of my bone and came up with a solution,though I was hesitant initially but got convinced by his sincerity and dedication towards his patients. My bone healed after 5 years of failed surgeries (6 in total).Its been a year of the last surgery, my hand is normal now and am able to do all the work with the hand including driving 2 wheeler. Am really grateful n thankful to Dr.Karan for saving me from more surgeries. He is the best Ortho in Bangalore,very calm,composed,knows his field ,has in-depth knowledge,explains the problem as many times as patients ask without getting irritated. Thank you so much Dr. for giving me hospital free life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
If there is someone who is royally breaking up the negative stereotyping some doctors have managed to make in the minds of the patients, its him.

Visited for my mom's lower limb pain and she underwent a successful hassle-free knee replacement by him. 

I have to say this, he is one of the most polite, professional and clinically sound surgeons we have come across. His approach is clearly indicative of 'first do no harm'. Add to it, he is communicative, and has a re-assuring aura about him. Doctor is well learned and  very bright in my opinion. Mother's recovery was also smooth and painfree and results were good. He explains everything at every stage: consultation, pre and post surgery, and keeps your expectations practical and real by making you aware of every issue and prospective solution, and the extent achievable. 

In short , he is honest and makes no false promises. Guess, that what he means by patient centric approach.
I have  to sincerely thank him and his entire team for everything, and recommend him strongly.
reply_text: Appreciate your time for this feedback!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Leg Pain,Bone Fracture,Lower Back Pain,Knee Pain,Foot Pain,
review: Dr Karan Kukreja is real master of his art. My wife and I visited him on multiple occasions and he treated and fixed the problem on all such events with perfectionism. His understanding of human bone structure is phenomenal. His way of treatment is simple yet effective. True genius

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Today evening I visited Dr Karan Kukreja at Manipal for pain in my right feet . I also have heel spur .He examined my foot and explained to me in detail about the issue.  He also showed me some exercises which I am supposed to do . Unlike other doctors who only show interest in patient if the issue is complex or they can do an upcoming surgery on him/her , Dr Karan is very different. He treats everything with equal seriousness. I have seen doctors tend to neglect minor issues and feel interested only when they see a chance to do surgery . For a patient every issue even a small one is important as it is about his/her health.  Dr  Karan is definitely that doctor who will hear to your small queries and small issues and address them completely.  He gives full information and doesn't rush.  Today I could see he was very  busy yet he addressed my every issue every query. I left happy and with a light heart . Lot of respect for you doctor. 
. Thank you . You are gem .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was having grievous shoulder pain, despite of consulting orthopedic doctors ** **** *** ** no use. When checking in my friends circle I was referred by my friend to consult with Dr. Karan for his ********* treatment. After consulting Dr. Karan (Good thing about his consultation, he listens to patients without jumping to conclusions and also tries to avoid surgery in first place) suggested to go through physiotherapy for about two months and post that also if pain is not reduced, he said we will think of surgery.I have been doing Subscapular physio exercise, my labral tear pain has reduced to good extent.Thanks to Dr.Karan.
reply_text:
Thanks Neelakant!
wish you a speedy recovery!

review: I took my mother for her knee surgery to Dr Karan Kukreja. He is a true professional and very friendly, who explained in detail the pre and post surgery proces and treatment plan. He followed up post surgery and gave very precise advice which is helping my mother to recover fast. I strongly recommend him as a very competent and friendly orthopedic surgeon. Thanks Dr. Karan. Regards, vivek

review:
Dr. Karan has strong command over the subject and is visibly experienced. 

I was operated on right knee ACL Reconstruction and lateral Miniscus repair on 10th January. Dr. Karan‚Äôs tram is also experienced and helped a lot in seamless surgery procedure. 

I started walking without any support within 1 week of surgery. Post surgery rehabilitation procedure suggested is very effective. 

Magical hands ! Highly recommend.
reply_text:
Thanks for your kind words Lakshay.
Hope you are feeling better!
